text: Gallier House, also known as James Gallier, Jr., House was the home of American architect James Gallier, Jr. in New Orleans, Louisiana. Gallier designed the house himself. It is located on Royal Street in the French Quarter section of the city. It was declared a National Historic Landmark in 1974. and Gallier House now houses a museum, with the interior restored and furnished in the style of the 1850s. ==References== ==Other websites== * Gallier House. title: Gallier House
